scripts.test:functions: cd progress/react && yarn test && cd ../angular && yarn test && cd ../..
scripts.test:all: yarn install && yarn install --dev && yarn test:svg && yarn test:progress
scripts.move: mkdir -p tmp && mv svg/README.md tmp/README.md && mv svg/package.json tmp/package.json
scripts.move-back: mv tmp/README.md svg/README.md && mv tmp/package.json svg/package.json && rm -rf tmp
scripts.copy: yarn move && rm -r svg && mkdir svg && copyfiles -f -e "design/old/*.svg" -e "design/Internal/*.svg" -e "design/WIP/*.svg" -e "design/Products/**/*.svg" "design/Products/*.svg" design/**/*.svg design/**/**/*.svg svg && yarn move-back
scripts.build: yarn && yarn copy && rm -r iconfont && mkdir iconfont && icon-font-generator svg/*.svg -o iconfont -n PXBlueIcons -p pxb && yarn sprites && yarn index
scripts.build:progress: cd progress/react && yarn && yarn build && cd ../angular && yarn && yarn build
